column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were seated downstairs
column2: which while nice if on a date
column3: was a bit dark for me forcing me to pull out the flashlight app to read the menu. Our kids had Shirley Temples
column4: which they thought were really good. The server said they use real cherry juice in them. I thought the ice-to-drink ratio was way too high (at least 1:1)
column5: but they bring another round without us commenting on it.
